#Description of the project

= Introduction =

UDE - wow - tcg


= Details =

Features:
  * *Manage whole cards* (search, filter, ...)
  * *Manage own collection* (cards owned, cards wanted, cards tradable...)
  * *Deck construction* (including restriction and exception)
  * *Trading mechanism* (Export, online capabilities ???)

Database creation:
  * Using sevral xml files, one per release (Crafted item or promotional cards tbd)
  * Squeleton of the xml file:
    <card 
      id="" 
      name="" 
      faction="" 
      type="" 
      keywords="" 
      race="" 
      class="" 
      talent="" 
      professions="" 
      cost="" 
      atk="" 
      strike_cost="" 
      def="" 
      health="" 
      rarity="" 
      illustrator="">
      <cardtext> </cardtext>
      <flavortext> </flavortext>
    </card>
  * The id number will contain information concerning the card number, the release (Azeroth, Dark Portal ...) AND will be the name of the associated .jpg:
     Heroes of Azeroth : HOA***.jpg
     Onyxia : ONY***.jpg
     Burning Crusade : BC***.jpg
     Dark Portal : DP***.jpg
     Molten Core : MC***.jpg
     Fire of the Outland : FOO***.jpg
     March of the Legion : MOL***.jpg
     Magtheridon's Lair : MAG***.jpg
     Servants of the Betrayer : SOB***.jpg
     The Hunt for Illidan : HFI***.jpg
